args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . In the lead-up to President Donald Trump’s inauguration, mentions of “oligarchy” among prominent left-wing politicians and... In the lead-up to President Donald Trump’s inauguration, mentions of “oligarchy” among prominent left-wing politicians and influencers surged nearly tenfold, according to a Washington Post analysis. Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vermont) revived the term in response to reports about Elon Musk heading a new commission focused on government spending. The discussion intensified after President Joe Biden’s farewell address Jan. 15, when he warned of an emerging oligarchy and a powerful tech-industrial complex in America.
